titlestmt.titleproper: Sara J. MacDonald dance ephemera collection 1983-1994
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Sara J. MacDonald dance ephemera collection

bioghist.p: Sara J. MacDonald is Public Services Librarian at the University of the Arts in Philadelphia. She donated this collection of material to Temple's Philadelphia Dance Collection.

scopecontent.p: This is a small collection of dance related materials collected by Sara McDonald, much of it pertaining to Steve Krieckhaus, a Philadelphia dancer. Items include: clippings (photocopies); programs, posters, flyers, and announcements (1983-1994); photos of Steve Krieckhaus by Lois Greenfield; and a Fall 1994 poster for the Painted Bride.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
